publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-612# Paul Martin: Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital—That the Parliament notes with concern the proposal by NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to introduce car parking charges at Stobhill Hospital later this year; recognises the impact that this proposal will have on the local community through inconsiderate parking by car commuters in residential areas surrounding the hospital; is concerned that current provision of public transport to and from Stobhill Hospital is insufficient, and considers that a new car parking policy that would remove car parking charges at Stobhill Hospital should be developed. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*, Alex Neil*, Karen Gillon*, Cathie Craigie*, Michael McMahon*, David Whitton*, David Stewart*, Bill Butler*, Patricia Ferguson*, Elaine Smith*, Des McNulty*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-612# Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 3 October 2007) Jackie Baillie*, Gil Paterson*, Mr Frank McAveety*

S3M-612# Paul Martin: Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital—That the Parliament notes with concern the proposal by NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to introduce car parking charges at Stobhill Hospital later this year; recognises the impact that this proposal will have on the local community through inconsiderate parking by car commuters in residential areas surrounding the hospital; is concerned that current provision of public transport to and from Stobhill Hospital is insufficient, and considers that a new car parking policy that would remove car parking charges at Stobhill Hospital should be developed. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Alex Neil, Karen Gillon, Cathie Craigie, Michael McMahon, David Whitton, David Stewart, Bill Butler, Patricia Ferguson, Elaine Smith, Des McNulty, Trish Godman, Cathy Peattie, Jackie Baillie, Gil Paterson, Mr Frank McAveety
S3M-612# Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 3 October 2007) Helen Eadie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-612# Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 3 October 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-612# Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 3 October 2007) Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-612# Paul Martin: Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital—That the Parliament notes with concern the proposal by NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to introduce car parking charges at Stobhill Hospital later this year; recognises the impact that this proposal will have on the local community through inconsiderate parking by car commuters in residential areas surrounding the hospital; is concerned that current provision of public transport to and from Stobhill Hospital is insufficient, and considers that a new car parking policy that would remove car parking charges at Stobhill Hospital should be developed. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Alex Neil, Karen Gillon, Cathie Craigie, Michael McMahon, David Whitton, David Stewart, Bill Butler, Patricia Ferguson, Elaine Smith, Des McNulty, Trish Godman, Cathy Peattie, Jackie Baillie, Gil Paterson, Mr Frank McAveety, Helen Eadie, Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Hugh Henry, Dr Richard Simpson Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-612# Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 3 October 2007) Pauline McNeill*
S3M-612# Car Parking Charges at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 3 October 2007) Bob Doris*
